column6:
The ripple effects continue through JMS and Tommy Lee Edwards' alternate Marvel Universe. What strange twist will lead to the creation of the Spider-Man, who will replace Steve Rogers as the new Iron Man and what monumental presence threatens the very existence of humanity?,2007,2
32 PGS./Rated T+ ...$2.99
column8: | penciller (cover):Tommy Lee Edwards | writer:Stan Lee | letterer:John Workman
